Trade/Device Name(s): AgaMatrix Liberty Blood Glucose Test Strips
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Liberty Blood Glucose Monitoring System for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from fingertip, palm, or forearm.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from fingertip, palm, or forearm; for home use by people with diabetes and for use in clinical settings by healthcare professionals; not intended for use with neonates.
